website_summaries.verdict: Imagine a Nexus 7's innards expanded to a 10-inch tablet and you've got the Asus MeMo Pad Smart 10. Now ask yourself: why wouldn't you want something better?
pros: The Asus MeMo Pad Smart 10 has a rear-facing camera, microSD and Micro-HDMI ports, and solid performance for a budget tablet

customer_reviews.title: Really obsolete version of Android, but I was aware of that when getting it
customer_reviews.text: I really can't recommend this as functionality is severely hobbled by the lack of ability to update the operating system. The latest browser won't install, so this hobbles web surfing functionality. Netflix won't install at all, so that capability isn't existent. I got this to watch movies while on the treadmill and exercise bike, and I've found workarounds for that, but again, that may only be a matter of time. The tablet has extremely limited functionality. Update a month later: this is stuck in a boot loop and is useless. I re-install the OS and it's fine for a few minutes and starts boot looping again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Horst

customer_reviews.title: What an awful experience. The wifi went out after ...
customer_reviews.text: What an awful experience. The wifi went out after a few months. I returned the unit to ASUS , it was still under warranty. THey keep asking me for money and will not fix the unit unless I pay for it . It is under warranty I have asked ASUS to let me speak with a supervisor on multiple occasions and they will not . ASUS will keep me on hold for very long periods, I have been treated quite poorly, UPDATE: i had to pay them to get my warranty repair. and guess what?? it is still not fixed, HELP ME AMAZON!!
customer_reviews.author: M. L. T.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this tablet
customer_reviews.text: It died after only a year and a half of use. Only used for a popular game. Never taken out of the house or dropped or had anything spill on it. I googled the problem and found many other people had the same problem. Just a piece of junk. Asus support wanted 61.00 just to look at it. Would not recommend this tablet. Going to try a different brand and will not be buying it on Amazon because its hard to believe they haven't gotten alot of complaints about this item and they still sold it.
customer_reviews.author: dd

customer_reviews.title: It was good for four months and then...
customer_reviews.text: In the four months since purchase the MeMo worked very well. It did everything I needed it to do and I was happy with the purchase. But then with no initial signs of an impending problem the touchscreen just stop working. Called Asus customer service and after performing some diagnostics over the phone we determined that it was a hardware issue and was given an RMA to return for repair. . To my surprise the process of getting an RMA from Asus customer service went smoothly. Hopefully the tablet will be returned to me functioning as well as it did before the touchscreen failed. If not for the touchscreen failing I would have given this tablet four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: WiFi does not work
customer_reviews.text: WiFi does not work. Although it sees the router, it will not connect to it. It failed with 3 different routers, and a different ASUS tablet has no problem with its WiFi connection. So I am sure the tablet is the problem. A search with this specific model shows several other people have suffered with this problem. I am ordering a different ASUS model ME 102A to replace this defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Basin

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet for the money
customer_reviews.text: This an entry level Asus 10.1 tablet and the price is right. It doesn't have some features like brightness control but the default brightness is very good. It has a minimum internal memory of 16 gig but upgradable with flash memory. It has a Android 4.4 which is a plus. I use it for games, reading, web searching and email. I've had for 2 weeks with no problems. I thought I had a problem with the updated version of Words With Friends but found out the frequent crashes were due to problems with the upgrades reported by a lot of people who play the game.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: This product worked wonderfully until the 30 day warranty expired
customer_reviews.text: This is was purchased to replace my son's broken tablet which was the same model. This product worked wonderfully until the 30 day warranty expired. At five weeks the tablet would only connect to the wifi if you were standing within 2 feet of the router. At the time of this review it will not connect at all. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for making your  tablets  so easy to break. Yay!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for making your tablets so easy to break. My two-year-old son enjoys so much while he was break in it and my wife Westside at the beginning but she realize that she was getting addicted to Facebook FaceTime and tweeter . But now she has more time with her hands and she even learn to cook. yay!
customer_reviews.author: KING AL

customer_reviews.title: Unable to unlock bootloader.
customer_reviews.text: It is only worth it if you want to unlock the bootloader to upgrade the ROM. Otherwise there are newer better tablets. Unfortunately I discovered late that this is one of those refurbished that cannot be unlocked because the serial number is not in ASUS database. I called the seller but they told me the 30 days warranty had passed and did not want to change it. So I am stuck with an obsolete ROM, Android 4.2.
customer_reviews.author: Caim

customer_reviews.title: Battery Stopped Charging
customer_reviews.text: After two years of use the battery has stopped charging. Have had serious issues from the start so it's not worth fixing. It has always run very slow and the sound volume is quite low at the highest setting. Also would lose sound intermittently, which required a reboot. Do not recommend this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Entertainment and Surfing
customer_reviews.text: The ASUS MeMo Pad 10" tablet is a portable way to web surf and enjoy multimedia. It has adequate power to do what it needs to. It streams video capably and works well as an e-book reader--without the Kindle Fire price. It should be noted that the MeMo pad only has Wi-Fi--with no 3G or 4G capability. The camera takes decent photos, and the built in cloud storage widget is a nice way to store photos online. This product is a solid performer at a budget friendly price.
customer_reviews.author: there_are_some_who_call_me_Tim

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this item from the beginning. I loved the size of the screen, the quality of HD videos and pics, the built in camera and mic, and the Android OS, but.... After four months of using it, a tiny blue line appeared across the screen at about one and a half inch from the bottom side (holding it vertically). It didn't bothered me too much but about a week later the screen started to show several colored lines under the one that has already appeared and that was really annoying since it voids one fifth of the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Penton

customer_reviews.title: no adobe flashplayer
customer_reviews.text: Aside from no adobe flash player ,Everything else is super and netflix movies stream flawlessly. My problem is I travel and could not play any of my games that require adobe flash player ... bummer. I think i am going to return it. I bought the keyboard case with it and it worked at first then nothing I cannot get it to sync at all and customer service hasn't been much help either. I was unable to find any help through google search as folio key is not recognized AT ALL under any search.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Morris

customer_reviews.title: great tablet excellent value
customer_reviews.text: this is my second one. 1st memo i bought the touch started to fail. so far so good with this 2nd tablet like a tf300 but better. fairly fast and responsive. excellent value. power and volume and ports are kinda awkward but you'll get used to their placement. i give it 4 stars cause the data cord is way to short and in a folio case the power and volume are cumbersome to get to.
customer_reviews.author: Frustrated gamer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot beat the price or the value!
customer_reviews.text: Tablet is just what I needed for school! Battery life is great and allows me to work on it all day! It doesn't take too long to be fully charged either, I just plug it in at night and its ready in the morning. The camera is also a lot nicer than I expected, the quality of the images are great. I also enjoy how light it is! I was used to lugging around a tablet PC that weighs much more than this tablet! It is a great relief! Highly recommended for a student who is on a budget and needs a tablet with excellent battery life!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha James

customer_reviews.title: Touch screen not so touch
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up for work. We are looking into getting tablets for new employees with training material and documents they need and wanted one for testing. Tablet's screen is mostly unresponsive. Plug it in, cannot use the tablet. Unplug it, have to wait 5 - 20 minutes before screen allows you to do anything, reboot, same thing as it being plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: BrianTop Contributor: Board Games

customer_reviews.title: ASUS home run
customer_reviews.text: I believe that ASUS hit a home run with the MeMo Pad. It has a great IPS display with wide viewing angles (Almost HD quality in the dispaly); Strong battery life(The battery life is great, and it will run almost 9 hours straight on a single charge); Good camera with lots of features; The sound is great but the speakers would be better if they were front facing or on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Can't connect to WiFi, common problem.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this tablet. I have had a recurring problem connecting to WiFi and have tried everything I can think of to fix it. It won't connect to my home network or several other networks I have tried. I even tried a factory reset and still no luck. This is a common problem, check out forums for your self. Spend the extra money and get a Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This is my first venture into the world of mobile devices. Even my cell phone is an old flip top. I bought this tablet so I could upload my portfolio into the gallery to show off my work with clients. Works beautifully! Then I started using Gmail on this, my god, what have I been missing? News apps, games and Kindle! For whats been called an entry level tablet this surpasses all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: MASTERCHIEF

customer_reviews.title: Everything I want in a Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a fast tablet with a good video resolution, micro USB port and an HDMI port which I found all in the Asus MeMo. It finds my 5 ghz router single all over the house with 3 out of 5 bars. My wife's Samsung Tab 2 does not even detect the signal. I wish it had Polaris Office as I have used it before and like it. I will just download. Also, the push by Google to setup a gmail account is annoying. But I Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike74

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this. Easy to use right out of the box. no problem hooking it to my wifi and a compatible keyboard. Recently took it traveling and it worked like a top. I bought it to replace a Lenovo that went insane on me less then a month after buying it. The one thing I have to learn. however, is to side-load Flash so I can view some of the videos I'm missing on Hulu.So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Sable Jak

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet was my first introduction to the Andriod operating system, but overall I am very pleased with the operation of the device. It seems to be smooth and seemless. Great for watching videos on, and the battery life is ok. Only about 2-3 hours of battery life if you are using wifi with bluetooth (for keyboard and such), but standby time for me was around 7 hours. Powered off at full charge, the battery only dropped to 75% after 10 days.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: I Like It.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the enclosed instructions, charged the battery as recommended, turned it on and within just a few minutes it was ready to use. The resolution of the screen is fine, the sound is slightly poorer than my Kindle, but is not bad. I also have an Asus lap top and it has performed well for the last three years which was the primary reason that I chose this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Got this tablet for myself but hubby was having computer problems so he ended up snagging it from me. I will be purchasing another, he loves it and it was exactly what I wanted. The next one will make two people very happy, they are great value for the money. The size is perfect, light weight, and great operating system.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This thing will not connect to the internet if its sitting right next to the router/phone thats serving as a hotspot. ridiculous. I bought it for work and the ONE thing i need it to do is load a web page. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet to replace one I had bought in January. I wish I would of bought this back then as it is everything I was looking for. I really like the navy blue color as well. the screen is really clear and sharp great for watching videos. It was very easy to set up and customize and easy to use. anyone wanting a great tablet for the Price I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lee Wood

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet, poor battery
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this tablet for about two weeks and I'm pretty satisfied with it. However I am concern that the battery charges painfully slow, even though I have followed all the instructions specified in the manual. Today it has taken four hours to go from 10% to 73%. As I said I am comfortable with the performance of the tablet, both in response to applications, and image quality but I have the dilemma of whether return it or find a solution from somewhere...
customer_reviews.author: Rolo

customer_reviews.title: big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: screen doesn't respond when temperature rises. I have to strap an ice pack to it. It can't interpret older PDF files correctly with it's built-in file manager, and screws up their display if I zoom them.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Bohannan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tab - memory and OS
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is fantastic. For the money it is tops! The main reasons why I got this is because it runs on android jelly bean 2.1 (updates are going to be minimal from here on until Keylime Pie) and you can add memory when you run out. Find a tablet that does better for the cost and abilities. I am 99.9% certain you can't unless it is refurbished. Asus has released its next version so it might be even cheaper now. I strongly suggest you get this UNLESS you have to overpay for an iPad.
customer_reviews.author: R. T. Miner

customer_reviews.title: This pad was the worst electronic item i have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This pad was the worst electronic item i have ever had. These ASUS pad series had battery problems. Some pads have good and some have really bad. I got the really bad one. They battery completely died in 6 months and I am unable to charge it. For the past year it has been collecting dust. Do not buy this pad. Your chances of getting the one with good battery are 50/50.
customer_reviews.author: Mnj

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet, does all that it should very well
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with performance. I have tried a few tablets and came back to this one - and at this price point, it cannot be beat. Screen is good from quite wide viewing angles, the processor seems fast, surfs the web well. With the addition of the Asus natching keyboard / folio, it becomes a mini-laptop.
customer_reviews.author: ebk02

customer_reviews.title: Never buy an Asus.
customer_reviews.text: Paid almost 200.00 for this tablet and it hasn't worked in months, won't hook up to the internet and the keyboard goes crazy., putting letters that weren't typed. So disgusted. Just had another friend who ordered an Asus laptop. He had it 2 weeks and had to send it back and they want to give him a reconditioned one...
customer_reviews.author: Karen Foley

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet! Got it for my husband who mostly ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet! Got it for my husband who mostly uses it to read up on various sports stuff. I set up most of his sites for sports and news and he rarely needs any help with it - he's not very tech advanced! By the way, bought it as "like New" and it was in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Susan McF

customer_reviews.title: Great tab for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great tab for the price. No docking station like the transformer but get a case with a keyboard and it's the same thing. Has mini hdmi out and a micro SD expansion slot. If that's not enough buy a micro USB to OTG USB adapter to connect your own usb flash drive for more storage.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: Poor WiFi performance,  the Asus Memo Pad fhd 10 inch tablet is much better.
customer_reviews.text: Problem with my used tablet I bought was that it had extremely bad WIFI performance. My mobile hotspot wifi connection would not work more than 3 ft away from the tablet. The reseller probably didn't check the wifi before selling it to me.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Eh buy a better quality one
customer_reviews.text: Nice bang for your buck downside is that the battery sucks and I do mean suck! The screen sometimes glitches up and kicks me out of what I am doing (bad no no). I recommend just using the 300 smackaroos you spent on this and buying a better Asus 2 in 1 tablet
customer_reviews.author: TPG

customer_reviews.title: This was a very good tablet, bought two of them and each one ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good tablet, bought two of them and each one lasted over a year before the touch screen stopped recognizing any input. But for the price I got them, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Javier P

customer_reviews.title: Asus Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet. It is very sleek and stylish. I don't like after starting up the tablet it goes in to a power saver mode, the screen goes blank and I have to push the start button again to get the tablet to say on for awhile. Otherwise the screen resolution is great.
customer_reviews.author: dancer

customer_reviews.title: Not an IPad, but price is intriguing.
customer_reviews.text: This pad is great for surfing the net. It has good resolution, and nice sound. I don't have anything nice to say about the web storage. It took me a long, long time to select all of my music file (no select all function), then they didn't upload. I really don't need it anyway. If you are buying it for the camera, that's not the greatest either. There are a lot of cool apps available. I use guitar tuner, and audio recording apps. They work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my Asus Smart Pad
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my Asus Smart Pad. I have to say that I"ve not used it as much as I thougt I would, but that's because my wi-fo reception is not too good,. It kinda keeps me localized to get good reception.
customer_reviews.author: JEANNE WRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Great Distraction
customer_reviews.text: There’s an individual who frequents my local bar who isn’t all there in the head. Doesn’t hurt anybody, but can be quite annoying. I purchased this tablet as a method of distracting him. The scheme is working well as long as the speakers are turned down low and the battery life is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Works great but no real support as with other ASUS computer ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great but no real support as with other ASUS computer products. Not compatible with some apps like cable TV. No further updates after jellybean..Not disappointed with performance.
customer_reviews.author: tonar

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product and great price fast delivery. product had problem that was quickly and professionaly handled.
customer_reviews.author: T. D. Stolee

customer_reviews.title: For Parents
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my parents and they love it. They use it more than there laptops. Screen is good size, memory is good for just checking emails and social media. Camera is good, and sound works well.
customer_reviews.author: T. Johns

customer_reviews.title: Good for 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup. Worked well for about 1 month and one day it wouldn't turn on. I tried everything and nothing worked. I contacted amazon and I sent it back. I purchased an 8inch samsung instead. Amazon has great customer service that's why I gave 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: dxxldiva

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great!
customer_reviews.text: Having used other tablets, I must say that this one keeps up with them and at a far lower cost. The user interface is responsive and battery life is good. I have had no issues so far and would tell anyone to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: O. K. Maharaj

customer_reviews.title: Fast cheap good quadcore
customer_reviews.text: It is fast , nice screen and sound , and an amazing cheap price . Good camera , charge lasts for a couple of days and thats good . I posted this comparing to other tabs in this year , but this tab is old but can compete these days tabs . U can buy a stylus to draw in it smoothly .
customer_reviews.author: Fawaz Alharthi

customer_reviews.title: Love this ASUS tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet at a much better price than the box stores. I had a TF300 and loved the tablet but hated that it didn't use a standard cell phone charger. This one does and it's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: SReynolds

customer_reviews.title: hunk of junk
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap! I ordered one last year and it was flawless and hasn't had a problem at all. This one here not so much. It kept shutting off and eventually the WiFi stopped working completly. Sent it back and ordered a galaxy tab 4.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Many, many features on here and we are happy that we purchased this. Highly recommend it to others, camera, apps included with it are great. The video camera feature is excellent, clear pictures, clear voice. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bootsy57

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet for the price. Bought it for my dad for christmas. He basically just uses it to surf craigslist and ebay. Didn't need anything too expensive for this. This tablet is probably way overpowered for that, but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ben K.

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Fast enough. Nice screen, it would be better with full hd resolution, but for the price is perfect, good colors, very good viewing angle. No lag at all. Good sound. USB, HDMI, micro SD, all I need. The only problem is that the accelerometer is defective, if a put it in a plane surface, the acelerometer reads something like 20 degrees to the left. I'm in Argentina so I can't replace it and I'll have to live with that, no big problem for me anyway. Very happy with it. In that price range I think is unbeatable for a 10.1 tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Mercerat

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet only complaint is it only is 4
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet only complaint is it only is 4.2 I wish I can upgrade to like 4.4 KitKat or something
customer_reviews.author: Kyle M

customer_reviews.title: Happy to have my first tablet
customer_reviews.text: This product is fast, light, user friendly and the price is awesome. I wasn't sure how I'd adapt to it but it was so easy to set up and use that i am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Lady

customer_reviews.title: This unit is an excellent substitute for the iPad or Samsung
customer_reviews.text: It has just as many things inside and built by the maker of the Nexus 7 for google. We have had for it over 6 months and it works like a champ it is much less expensive than the iPad and Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Defective piece of junk! DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived Early as usual from Amazon. Seemed to boot up nicely once it was fully charged. Everything worked fine EXCEPT that it wouldn't Connect to the Internet even though it connected just fine to my Home Wifi ! Called ASUS Customer Service and spent an hour on phone with a Technician who offered to replace the Built-In Wireless card under warranty but I elected to return to Amazon for a full refund instead. Products should NOT be defective this bad right out of the box! I will NOT Buy this product again unless I have my hot hands on it and am convinced that the MOST IMPOrTANT PART of the whole damn thing is functioning! Bye-Bye ASUS
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Seiloff

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem as sturdy as some tablets I've seen but my granddaughters are very happy with them. We bought 2, because it was the best price with a good review.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Best!!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had waited for the 32gb but this tablet is so fast and the graphics are the absolute best. Will never have another Kindle or Ipad. The very best in all aspects, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A Helms

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Really good, no problem so far. Nice size screen. I had to buy some memory card. Camera so-so. I would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: adrian1977

customer_reviews.title: Caveat
customer_reviews.text: Returned for defective screen after a week. This is the 2nd ASUS product in a row that I've returned for the exact same defect -- the other was a laptop. I'm done with ASUS.
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for 8 days but so far I am impressed. Great screen quality, good battery life. Nice size and very lightweight. Fast and has good sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy L. Lalonde

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tablet for my senior mom. So far is easy to use especially for beginners. Very clear picture. Great volume. I have even recommended to my family members and friends. I really like it !
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Don't know where to start. Internet connection issues from ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't know where to start. Internet connection issues from hell. My Nexus 7 2012 works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Ray F. Mihulka III

customer_reviews.title: It does not connect on the internet. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: It does not connect on the internet. I have tried all possibilities, and it is not possible. Next time they should let us know about any inconvenience. Thanks for this opportunity.
customer_reviews.author: freddy m. cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Terrific tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love the functionality and style. A nice little workhorse that is super handy and sharp looking on top! Decent graphics, good speed, simple to navigate, and lots of options for work or play. Very glad I ordered it and would not hesitate to recommend it to friends & family.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Star Farms

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a great buy !!! Awesome price almost in perfect shape for a second hand tab
customer_reviews.author: Jerans Mora

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Notepad
customer_reviews.text: Very fast, updated to android 4.2, using a 32gb sd card inside, screen is a bit glary but I can live with it. Speakers do ok. Very nice and responsive screen, great brightness and color.
customer_reviews.author: Gaston

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it broke very easily. was very good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money. The battery drains pretty quickly if you watch a lot of videos on You Tube, but I would still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Have this tablet for over two years now and not a hiccup!
customer_reviews.author: Cal Blue

customer_reviews.title: there are no words
customer_reviews.text: There are no words for how amazing and in love i am with this!!! As i type this review from my tablet, i am so happy to have it. I got it at a back to school present and its amazing. Im a pre-med student and im so happy to have this as a study buddy. The camera is amazing and the sleek look of it makes me really happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kaytee

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the money..
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding tablet for the money, Wife uses it constantly for e-mail, Facebook, games, ect.. and she has had it a while now with zero problems..
customer_reviews.author: Duane L Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I previously had an iPad 1 and also have an Android phone. To replace the tablet, I really wanted to stick with Android even thought the iPad had a great app portfolio. After agonizing over all of the available options and the wide differences in prices, I finally went with this tablet, with the worry that I had been far too cheap. I am happy to report that after 2 weeks of heavy usage, this was definitely a good purchase. I wish that the USB connection for charging was a little more robust, but otherwise I have zero complaints! Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Internet connection quit
customer_reviews.text: The wifi connection quit on it after a month, everything else works great and so did the internet till now. Tried a factory re -set and still not working? there is no replacement and i am able to get a refund and very happy with the service.
customer_reviews.author: SRAMAZON

customer_reviews.title: Charging trouble
customer_reviews.text: Often does not charge, even when plugged in for hours. Sometimes doesn't turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it showed up in great condition. Performs well and has a couple nice ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it refurbished for my girlfriend, and it showed up in great condition. Performs well and has a couple nice features! Great for a budget tablet!!!
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, that's all.
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad for the price, but it seems a bit laggy to me, and I haven't even loaded it up all that much. Sometimes switching between apps is too slow for a tablet with these specs.
customer_reviews.author: Terry S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I like it better than an IPad...it is lighter and easier to use. Would recommend it to anyone looking for a tablet that is good and not overly expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet
customer_reviews.text: cant say enough good things- excellent performer and excellent value. Seems to everything well. Decent battery life, adequate screen brightness, good sound.
customer_reviews.author: esprit

customer_reviews.title: Bought for me, bigger than I wanted, needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for me, bigger than I wanted, needed small for my purse. Gave to 14 year old daughter bought same brand but smaller for me.
customer_reviews.author: Katlake

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Tablet on Oct 22. 2013. Today August 8 2014 tablet is dead. Blue screen showing. Tablet was working great. Only used for browsing internet and some game play.
customer_reviews.author: Barry crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet. We have two
customer_reviews.text: Great Tablet. We have two. I just had to buy my wife one. Great price. Works great and it has JellyBean 4.1. The best android Version I think. My wife likes it so much better than her Kindle Fire. She doesn't even turn her Kindle on anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Phillips4234

customer_reviews.title: ASUS Tablet very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting used to the tablet, very user friendly. I like the operating system and the ease of downloading Apps and books from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great with no complaints so far.
customer_reviews.text: Works good and havent had any problems so far. The cameras work really well for a tablet and i think it loads web pages pretty fast. If I could only get it back from my daughter now i'd be doing great....
customer_reviews.author: Rob Romero

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: With the exception of the lack of Adobe Flash, The Asus MeMO Pad Smart is an excellent tablet. I barely changed any of the default settings I liked it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Camielle

customer_reviews.title: Fast tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Very Fast, I only use it to watch Netflix and play games, the speed is way more than enough I wish it could do more.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I love my asus memo tablet 301t so far this is ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my asus memo tablet 301t so far this is my second purchase and both works very well
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Louis

customer_reviews.title: Tablet was defective and overheats
customer_reviews.text: Tablet started to overheat after a few uses. When I tried to pick it up, I dropped it as a result of the tablet being so hot. Company would not let me return it because the screen was cracked and they want it to be in perfect condition. However, when I asked them about their knowledge of the tablet overheating prior to selling it to me, they had no comment.
customer_reviews.author: D. jones

customer_reviews.title: Fast, responsive and priced right
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is fast and responsive. Price is phenomenal. My daughter uses it as a drawing tablet with sketchbook pro and it handles everything perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Becca M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Asus has made quality hardware for decades, Bought because of My Long track record with Them!
customer_reviews.author: D. Seeman

customer_reviews.title: 10 in Memo Asus tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Still trying it out. Had one, it malfunctioned. Trying another because my wife likes them.
customer_reviews.author: BCO58

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet when everything works right
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet when everything works right. I have had a few problems with it not wanting to turn on or charge at times.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I absolutelylove my tablet. I am still learning all ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutelylove my tablet. I am still learning all the features. My sister has invested in one. I wish there was a manuel on the tablet or that came with it. Other than that I really do not have any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a great pad and I was totally in love with it ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great pad and I was totally in love with it - unfortunately it stopped working after 3 weeks however the company is currently replacing it so I am rating it high thanks for their quick response!
customer_reviews.author: elise mcshee

customer_reviews.title: This was an exact replacement of my old tablet that ...
customer_reviews.text: This was an exact replacement of my old tablet that crashed. But it was DOA. Returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Bear Hunter

customer_reviews.title: ASUS built the MeMO tablet with the right balence of performance vs cost.
customer_reviews.text: Very good performance, excellent touch screen response, fantastic speakers but we wish they faced forward. It's fast, the Android OS is very stable, and it's the right size to keep it portable while being large enough for streaming Netflix without squinting. We're happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: what I was looking for. will tell my friends when searching for items to always always always check amazon first.
customer_reviews.author: cozmic

customer_reviews.title: First tablet purchase and I love it
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd be someone who owned a tablet but finally I ordered this one. I must say I have been surprised by how much I use it. It works perfectly and has met my expectations. I have no issues with it. In fact, I purchased another one for use at my store.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan C. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Definite buy
customer_reviews.text: Feel: Good Performance: Super. Not the highest resolution but ok. Tegra processor great. No lag. Ports: all needed (headphone,bluetooth,wlan,hdmi,SD slot, micro usb for charge and OTG) Price versus performance: 10/10 I bought 3, two for the kids and one for my wife and I to share (it might be a nr 4 soon)
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT!!! Much cheaper than an iPad. Fast. Good WiFi reception. Lot of apps for it.
customer_reviews.author: TED
